Room.Name: Carnival Midway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the main concourse of a very popular Carnival and Sideshow.
Room.LongDescription: The crowd surges and pushes as the barker proclaims the wonders of the world for only one gold piece. You see dwarves, elves, orcs, half-giants, gnomes, and humans all pushing each other to get a glimpse of the inside of the tents. Looks like the barker has deliberately left the flap open a little to give the crowd a tantalizing peek. It's a strange world where people will pay money to laugh at a freak.
